sentences.chinese: 於期仰天太息流涕曰：「於期每念之，常痛於骨髓，顧計不知所出耳！」
sentences.literal: Yuji faced heaven great sighed flowing tears: 'Yuji every think, often pained to bone marrow, but plan not know where out!'
sentences.idiomatic: Yuji faced heaven great sighed flowing tears: 'Yuji every think, often pained to bone marrow, but plan not know where out!'

sentences.chinese: 荊軻曰：「今有一言可以解燕國之患，報將軍之仇者，何如？」
sentences.literal: Jing Ke said: 'Now have one word can resolve Yan state suffering, repay general enmity, how?'
sentences.idiomatic: Jing Ke said: 'Now have one word can resolve Yan state suffering, repay general enmity, how?'

sentences.chinese: 於期乃前曰：「為之柰何？」
sentences.literal: Yuji then front: 'Do how?'
sentences.idiomatic: Yuji then front: 'Do how?'

sentences.chinese: 荊軻曰：「願得將軍之首以獻秦王，秦王必喜而見臣，臣左手把其袖，右手揕其匈，然則將軍之仇報而燕見陵之愧除矣。
sentences.literal: Jing Ke said: 'Wish get general head to present Qin king, Qin king must pleased see minister, minister left hand grasp his sleeve, right hand stab his chest, then general enmity repaid Yan seen humiliate shame removed.
sentences.idiomatic: Jing Ke said: 'Wish get general head to present Qin king, Qin king must pleased see minister, minister left hand grasp his sleeve, right hand stab his chest, then general enmity repaid Yan seen humiliate shame removed.

sentences.chinese: 將軍豈有意乎？」
sentences.literal: General how intend?'
sentences.idiomatic: General how intend?'

sentences.chinese: 樊於期偏袒搤捥而進曰：「此臣之日夜切齒腐心也，乃今得聞教！」
sentences.literal: Fan Yuji exposed shoulder choked cried advanced: 'This minister day night gnash teeth corrode heart, now get hear teaching!'
sentences.idiomatic: Fan Yuji exposed shoulder choked cried advanced: 'This minister day night gnash teeth corrode heart, now get hear teaching!'

sentences.chinese: 遂自剄。
sentences.literal: Thus self-slit.
sentences.idiomatic: Thus self-slit.

sentences.chinese: 太子聞之，馳往，伏尸而哭，極哀。
sentences.literal: Crown prince heard, galloped went, prostrated corpse cried, extreme sorrow.
sentences.idiomatic: Crown prince heard, galloped went, prostrated corpse cried, extreme sorrow.

sentences.chinese: 既已不可柰何，乃遂盛樊於期首函封之。
sentences.literal: Already could not handle what, then placed Fan Yuji head in box sealed.
sentences.idiomatic: Already could not handle what, then placed Fan Yuji head in box sealed.

sentences.chinese: 於是太子豫求天下之利匕首，得趙人徐夫人匕首，取之百金，使工以藥焠之，以試人，血濡縷，人無不立死者。
sentences.literal: Thus crown prince beforehand sought world sharp dagger, got Zhao person Xu lady dagger, bought hundred jin gold, made artisan with medicine temper, tested on person, blood wet thread, person none not immediately died.
sentences.idiomatic: Thus crown prince beforehand sought world sharp dagger, got Zhao person Xu lady dagger, bought hundred jin gold, made artisan with medicine temper, tested on person, blood wet thread, person none not immediately died.

sentences.chinese: 乃裝為遣荊卿。
sentences.literal: Then prepared send Jing Qing.
sentences.idiomatic: Then prepared send Jing Qing.

sentences.chinese: 燕國有勇士秦舞陽，年十三，殺人，人不敢忤視。
sentences.literal: Yan state had brave warrior Qin Wuyang, age thirteen, killed person, people dared not offend look.
sentences.idiomatic: Yan state had brave warrior Qin Wuyang, age thirteen, killed person, people dared not offend look.

sentences.chinese: 乃令秦舞陽為副。
sentences.literal: Thus commanded Qin Wuyang as deputy.
sentences.idiomatic: Thus commanded Qin Wuyang as deputy.

sentences.chinese: 荊軻有所待，欲與俱；
sentences.literal: Jing Ke had waited person, wished with go;
sentences.idiomatic: Jing Ke had waited person, wished with go;

sentences.chinese: 其人居遠未來，而為治行。
sentences.literal: That person dwelt far not come, yet prepared journey.
sentences.idiomatic: That person dwelt far not come, yet prepared journey.

sentences.chinese: 頃之，未發，太子遲之，疑其改悔，乃復請曰：「日已盡矣，荊卿豈有意哉？
sentences.literal: Moment, not issued, crown prince delayed him, suspected his change regret, then requested: 'Day already exhausted, Jing Qing how intend?
sentences.idiomatic: Moment, not issued, crown prince delayed him, suspected his change regret, then requested: 'Day already exhausted, Jing Qing how intend?

sentences.chinese: 丹請得先遣秦舞陽。」
sentences.literal: Dan please get first send Qin Wuyang.'
sentences.idiomatic: Dan please get first send Qin Wuyang.'

sentences.chinese: 荊軻怒，叱太子曰：「何太子之遣？
sentences.literal: Jing Ke angered, scolded crown prince: 'What crown prince send?
sentences.idiomatic: Jing Ke angered, scolded crown prince: 'What crown prince send?

sentences.chinese: 往而不返者，豎子也！
sentences.literal: Go not return, boy child!
sentences.idiomatic: Go not return, boy child!

sentences.chinese: 且提一匕首入不測之彊秦，仆所以留者，待吾客與俱。
sentences.literal: Moreover carry one dagger enter immeasurable strong Qin, servant so stay, wait my guest with go.
sentences.idiomatic: Moreover carry one dagger enter immeasurable strong Qin, servant so stay, wait my guest with go.

sentences.chinese: 今太子遲之，請辭決矣！」
sentences.literal: Now crown prince delays, please leave decided!'
sentences.idiomatic: Now crown prince delays, please leave decided!'

sentences.chinese: 遂發。
sentences.literal: Thus issued.
sentences.idiomatic: Thus issued.

sentences.chinese: 太子及賓客知其事者，皆白衣冠以送之。
sentences.literal: Crown prince and guests knew affair, all white clothes hats to send him.
sentences.idiomatic: Crown prince and guests knew affair, all white clothes hats to send him.

sentences.chinese: 至易水之上，既祖，取道，高漸離擊筑，荊軻和而歌，為變徵之聲，士皆垂淚涕泣。
sentences.literal: Reached Yi water above, already sacrificed, took road, Gao Jianli beat zhu, Jing Ke harmonized sang, made change zhi sound, scholars all hung tears wept.
sentences.idiomatic: Reached Yi water above, already sacrificed, took road, Gao Jianli beat zhu, Jing Ke harmonized sang, made change zhi sound, scholars all hung tears wept.

sentences.chinese: 又前而為歌曰：「風蕭蕭兮易水寒，壯士一去兮不復還！」
sentences.literal: Again front made song: 'Wind soughs Yi water cold, brave man one go not return!'
sentences.idiomatic: Again front made song: 'Wind soughs Yi water cold, brave man one go not return!'

sentences.chinese: 復為羽聲慨，士皆瞋目，發盡上指冠。
sentences.literal: Again made yu sound lofty, scholars all stared eyes, hair all up pointed caps.
sentences.idiomatic: Again made yu sound lofty, scholars all stared eyes, hair all up pointed caps.

sentences.chinese: 於是荊軻就車而去，終已不顧。
sentences.literal: Thus Jing Ke approached carriage departed, end not look back.
sentences.idiomatic: Thus Jing Ke approached carriage departed, end not look back.

sentences.chinese: 遂至秦，持千金之資幣物，厚遺秦王寵臣中庶子蒙嘉。
sentences.literal: Thus reached Qin, held thousand jin gift currency objects, thick presented Qin king favored minister middle minister Zi Meng Jia.
sentences.idiomatic: Thus reached Qin, held thousand jin gift currency objects, thick presented Qin king favored minister middle minister Zi Meng Jia.

sentences.chinese: 嘉為先言於秦王曰：「燕王誠振怖大王之威，不敢舉兵以逆軍吏，願舉國為內臣，比諸侯之列，給貢職如郡縣，而得奉守先王之宗廟。
sentences.literal: Jia for first spoke Qin king: 'Yan king truly shaken terrified great king's might, not dare raise troops to oppose army officials, wish whole state become inner minister, compare feudal lords ranks, give tribute duty like commandery county, able maintain guard former king ancestral temple.
sentences.idiomatic: Jia for first spoke Qin king: 'Yan king truly shaken terrified great king's might, not dare raise troops to oppose army officials, wish whole state become inner minister, compare feudal lords ranks, give tribute duty like commandery county, able maintain guard former king ancestral temple.

sentences.chinese: 恐懼不敢自陳，謹斬樊於期之頭，及獻燕督亢之地圖，函封，燕王拜送于庭，使使以聞大王，唯大王命之。」
sentences.literal: Fear not dare self-state, respectfully behead Fan Yuji head, and offer Yan Du Kang land map, box sealed, Yan king bowed sent at court, made envoy to hear great king, only great king command.'
sentences.idiomatic: Fear not dare self-state, respectfully behead Fan Yuji head, and offer Yan Du Kang land map, box sealed, Yan king bowed sent at court, made envoy to hear great king, only great king command.'

sentences.chinese: 秦王聞之，大喜，乃朝服，設九賓，見燕使者咸陽宮。
sentences.literal: Qin king heard, greatly pleased, court robes, set nine guests, saw Yan envoy Xianyang palace.
sentences.idiomatic: Qin king heard, greatly pleased, court robes, set nine guests, saw Yan envoy Xianyang palace.

sentences.chinese: 荊軻奉樊於期頭函，而秦舞陽奉地圖柙，以次進。
sentences.literal: Jing Ke presented Fan Yuji head box, Qin Wuyang presented land map case, by order advanced.
sentences.idiomatic: Jing Ke presented Fan Yuji head box, Qin Wuyang presented land map case, by order advanced.

sentences.chinese: 至陛，秦舞陽色變振恐，群臣怪之。
sentences.literal: Reached stairs, Qin Wuyang color changed trembled feared, ministers strange it.
sentences.idiomatic: Reached stairs, Qin Wuyang color changed trembled feared, ministers strange it.

sentences.chinese: 荊軻顧笑舞陽，前謝曰：「北蕃蠻夷之鄙人，未嘗見天子，故振慴。
sentences.literal: Jing Ke looked back laughed Wuyang, front apologized: 'North barbarian uncivilized rustic person, not tasted see emperor, thus tremble frightened.
sentences.idiomatic: Jing Ke looked back laughed Wuyang, front apologized: 'North barbarian uncivilized rustic person, not tasted see emperor, thus tremble frightened.

sentences.chinese: 願大王少假借之，使得畢使於前。」
sentences.literal: Wish great king little lenient, make him complete mission at front.'
sentences.idiomatic: Wish great king little lenient, make him complete mission at front.'

sentences.chinese: 秦王謂軻曰：「取舞陽所持地圖。」
sentences.literal: Qin king told Ke: 'Take Wuyang held land map.'
sentences.idiomatic: Qin king told Ke: 'Take Wuyang held land map.'

sentences.chinese: 軻既取圖奏之，秦王發圖，圖窮而匕首見。
sentences.literal: Ke having taken map presented, Qin king unrolled map, map exhausted dagger appeared.
sentences.idiomatic: Ke having taken map presented, Qin king unrolled map, map exhausted dagger appeared.

sentences.chinese: 因左手把秦王之袖，而右手持匕首揕之。
sentences.literal: Thus left hand grasped Qin king sleeve, right hand held dagger stabbed him.
sentences.idiomatic: Thus left hand grasped Qin king sleeve, right hand held dagger stabbed him.

sentences.chinese: 未至身，秦王驚，自引而起，袖絕。
sentences.literal: Not reached body, Qin king startled, self pulled rose, sleeve broke.
sentences.idiomatic: Not reached body, Qin king startled, self pulled rose, sleeve broke.

sentences.chinese: 拔劍，劍長，操其室。
sentences.literal: Drew sword, sword long, gripped its scabbard.
sentences.idiomatic: Drew sword, sword long, gripped its scabbard.

sentences.chinese: 時惶急，劍堅，故不可立拔。
sentences.literal: Time panicked urgent, sword firm, thus not could immediately draw.
sentences.idiomatic: Time panicked urgent, sword firm, thus not could immediately draw.

sentences.chinese: 荊軻逐秦王，秦王環柱而走。
sentences.literal: Jing Ke pursued Qin king, Qin king circled pillar walked.
sentences.idiomatic: Jing Ke pursued Qin king, Qin king circled pillar walked.

sentences.chinese: 群臣皆愕，卒起不意，盡失其度。
sentences.literal: Ministers all astonished, suddenly rose unexpected, all lost their measure.
sentences.idiomatic: Ministers all astonished, suddenly rose unexpected, all lost their measure.

sentences.chinese: 而秦法，群臣侍殿上者不得持尺寸之兵；
sentences.literal: Qin law, ministers served hall above not permitted hold inch weapons;
sentences.idiomatic: Qin law, ministers served hall above not permitted hold inch weapons;

sentences.chinese: 諸郎中執兵皆陳殿下，非有詔召不得上。
sentences.literal: Various langzhong held weapons all arrayed hall below, not have decree summon not could ascend.
sentences.idiomatic: Various langzhong held weapons all arrayed hall below, not have decree summon not could ascend.

sentences.chinese: 方急時，不及召下兵，以故荊軻乃逐秦王。
sentences.literal: When urgent time, not reached summon below troops, thus Jing Ke pursued Qin king.
sentences.idiomatic: When urgent time, not reached summon below troops, thus Jing Ke pursued Qin king.

sentences.chinese: 而卒惶急，無以擊軻，而以手共搏之。
sentences.literal: Yet finally panicked urgent, no with strike Ke, with hands together fought him.
sentences.idiomatic: Yet finally panicked urgent, no with strike Ke, with hands together fought him.

sentences.chinese: 是時侍醫夏無且以其所奉藥囊提荊軻也。
sentences.literal: At time attending physician Xia Wuqian with his carried medicine bag struck Jing Ke.
sentences.idiomatic: At time attending physician Xia Wuqian with his carried medicine bag struck Jing Ke.

sentences.chinese: 秦王方環柱走，卒惶急，不知所為，左右乃曰：「王負劍！」
sentences.literal: Qin king just circled pillar walked, finally panicked urgent, not knew what do, left right then said: 'King carry sword!'
sentences.idiomatic: Qin king just circled pillar walked, finally panicked urgent, not knew what do, left right then said: 'King carry sword!'

sentences.chinese: 負劍，遂拔以擊荊軻，斷其左股。
sentences.literal: Carry sword, then drew to strike Jing Ke, severed his left thigh.
sentences.idiomatic: Carry sword, then drew to strike Jing Ke, severed his left thigh.
